original_text: You have not yet reached the place where you can rest. That is in the land that the Lord your God is giving to you as your home.
korean_text: 너희가 너희 하나님 여호와께서 주시는 안식과 기업에 아직은 이르지 못하였거니와

sentences.original_text: You have not yet reached the place
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 아직 그 장소에 이르지 못하였다

sentences.original_text: that the Lord your God is giving to you
